hanzi-su-wiki:
揺

Значения

Качаться, дрожать; качаться, колебаться; раскачивать, трясти, быть в нерешительности; качаться; раскачивать; приводить в замешательство; трясти, пожимать плечами

Мнемоника

Взявшись 爫 за котёл 击 покачивать его рукой 扌, чтобы мясо лучше сварилось.

Варианты

搖, 摇
purpleculture_pinyin:
yáo
Japanese variant of 摇
Японский вариант встряски
rtega_mnemonic:
搖搖RS
摇摇		揺wag, swing, wave, shake, scull
  • two hands 扌 holding a jar 䍃 and shaking it begging for money; person standing on his head holding with two hands a jar 扌䍃
heisig_constituent: swing, finger, fingers, condor, claw, vulture, king, mountain
Keyword_KANJIDIC: swing, shake, sway, rock, tremble, vibrate
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Размах, трясти, раскачивание, рок, дрожать, вибрировать
koohiiStory1: Primitive: A condor is like a vulture but twice the size and lives in mountainous regions (+1 Elphalpo). Story: I swing my fingers back and forth, trying to fend off the attacking condor.
koohiiStory2: For the condor primitive: A condor is like a vulture, but twice as big and it lives near mountains (a suitable place for such a majestic bird). For swing: I´m sitting on a swing when a condor comes by and picks up the whole swing set with its big finger-like claws and now I´m swinging in mid-air. Weeeeeeeee!!!!!
kunYomi: ゆ.れる、ゆ.る、ゆ.らぐ、ゆ.るぐ、ゆ.する、ゆ.さぶる、ゆ.すぶる、うご.く
jp_example_words:
動揺(どうよう): disturbance, unrest, shaking, trembling, pitching, rolling, oscillation, agitation, excitement, commotion
揺さぶる(ゆさぶる): to shake, to jolt, to rock, to swing
揺らぐ(ゆらぐ): to swing, to sway, to shake, to tremble
揺れる(ゆれる): shake, quake
jp_readingExamples: 揺さぶる (ゆ.さぶる), 揺すぶる (ゆ.すぶる), 揺する (ゆ.する), 揺らぐ (ゆ.らぐ), 揺る (ゆ.る), 揺るぐ (ゆ.るぐ), 揺れる (ゆ.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You grab a satellite with your fingers and shake it! You're an astronaut and it's your job. Don't worry, the satellite won't break or anything, it's strong for space travel. Just do as you're told and shake the sucker.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being in space and shaking a satellite with your fingers.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to shake it because this satellite is full of yogurt (よう). And you only like yogurt that's been well shook. And who can resist space yogurt? Huh? Anyone?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine shaking yogurt in space. Now imagine eating yogurt as it continues to shake (in space still)!
Ru_Meaning: swing, shake, sway, rock, tremble, vibrate
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 遥 (はるか、ヨウ далеко), 瑶 (たま、ヨウ прекрасный как жемчужина), 謡 (うたい、ヨウ народная песня).
Ru_Radicals: 凵 (открытая коробка), 干 (сухой), 扎, 爪 (ноготь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) that claws (⺤) the can (缶) shakes

yáo
яп. вм. 摇
Radicals: 扌,  (fingers, satellite)
Meaning Mnemonic
You grab a satellite with your fingers and shake it! You're an astronaut and it's your job. Don't worry, the satellite won't break or anything, it's strong for space travel. Just do as you're told and shake the sucker.
Imagine being in space and shaking a satellite with your fingers.
Reading Mnemonic
You need to shake it because this satellite is full of yogurt (よう). And you only like yogurt that's been well shook. And who can resist space yogurt? Huh? Anyone?
Imagine shaking yogurt in space. Now imagine eating yogurt as it continues to shake (in space still)!
